00116     public function GetDependencies($type=null) {
00117         $dependenciesToReturn = array();
00118         foreach($this->dependencies as $dependency) {
00119             if($type == null || $type == $dependency->GetType()) {
00120                 $dependenciesToReturn[] = $dependency;
00121             }
00122         }
00123         return $dependenciesToReturn;
00124     }

00237     public function AddC1RemoveScriptFromRCB(IReader $reader) {
00238         if($this->removeScript != '') {
00239             throw new Exception('Script already added!');
00240         }
00241         $rcb = new COB($reader);
00242         $ablocks = $rcb->GetBlocks(COB_BLOCK_AGENT);
00243         $this->removeScript = $ablocks[0]->GetInstallScript();
00244     }

00252     public static function CreateFromReaderC2(IReader $reader) {
00253         $quantityAvailable = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00254         if($quantityAvailable == 0xffff) {
00255             $quantityAvailable = -1;
00256         }       
00257         $lastUsageDate = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00258         $reuseInterval = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00259         
00260         $expiryDay = $reader->ReadInt(1);
00261         $expiryMonth = $reader->ReadInt(1);
00262         $expiryYear = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00263         $expiryDate = mktime(0,0,0,$expiryMonth,$expiryDay,$expiryYear);
00264         
00265         $reserved = array($reader->ReadInt(4),$reader->ReadInt(4),$reader->ReadInt(4));
00266         
00267         $agentName = $reader->ReadCString();
00268         $agentDescription = $reader->ReadCString();
00269         
00270         $installScript = str_replace(',',"\n",$reader->ReadCString());
00271         $removeScript = str_replace(',',"\n",$reader->ReadCString());
00272         
00273         $numEventScripts = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00274         
00275         $eventScripts = array();
00276         
00277         for($i=0;$i<$numEventScripts;$i++) {
00278             $eventScripts[] = str_replace(',',"\n",$reader->ReadCString());
00279         }
00280         $numDependencies = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00281         $dependencies = array();
00282         
00283         for($i=0;$i<$numDependencies;$i++) {
00284             $type = ($reader->ReadInt(2) == 0)?DEPENDENCY_SPRITE:DEPENDENCY_SOUND;
00285             $name = $reader->ReadCString();
00286             $dependencies[] = new COBDependency($type,$name);
00287         }
00288         $thumbWidth = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00289         $thumbHeight = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00290     
00291         $thumbnail = new S16Frame($reader,'565',$thumbWidth,$thumbHeight,$reader->GetPosition());
00292         $reader->Skip($thumbHeight*$thumbWidth*2);
00293         
00294         //parsing finished, onto making an AgentBlock.
00295         $agentBlock = new COBAgentBlock($agentName,$agentDescription);
00296         $agentBlock->AddQuantityAvailable($quantityAvailable);
00297         $agentBlock->AddReuseInterval($reuseInterval);
00298         $agentBlock->AddExpiryDate($expiryDate);
00299         $agentBlock->AddLastUsageDate($lastUsageDate);
00300         $agentBlock->AddReserved($reserved[0],$reserved[1],$reserved[2]);
00301         $agentBlock->AddInstallScript($installScript);
00302         $agentBlock->AddRemoveScript($removeScript);
00303         foreach($eventScripts as $eventScript) {
00304             $agentBlock->AddEventScript($eventScript);
00305         }
00306         foreach($dependencies as $dependency) {
00307             $agentBlock->AddDependency($dependency);
00308         }
00309         $agentBlock->AddThumbnail($thumbnail);
00310         return $agentBlock;
00311         
00312     }
00314 
00319     public static function CreateFromReaderC1(IReader $reader) {
00320         $quantityAvailable  = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00321         $expires_month = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00322         $expires_day = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00323         $expires_year = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00324         $expiryDate = mktime(0,0,0,$expires_month,$expires_day,$expires_year);
00325                 
00326         $numObjectScripts = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00327         $numInstallScripts = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00328         $quantityUsed = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00329         $objectScripts = array();
00330         for($i=0;$i<$numObjectScripts;$i++) {
00331             $scriptsize = $reader->ReadInt(1);
00332             if($scriptsize == 255) {
00333                 $scriptsize = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00334             }
00335             $objectScripts[$i] = $reader->Read($scriptsize);
00336         }
00337         $installScripts = array();
00338         for($i=0;$i<$numInstallScripts;$i++) {
00339             $scriptsize = $reader->ReadInt(1);
00340             if($scriptsize == 255) {
00341                 $scriptsize = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00342             }
00343             $installScripts[$i] = $reader->Read($scriptsize);
00344         }
00345         $pictureWidth = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00346         $pictureHeight = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00347         $unknown = $reader->ReadInt(2);
00348         $sprframe = null;
00349         if($pictureWidth > 0 || $pictureHeight > 0) {
00350             $sprframe = new SPRFrame($reader,$pictureWidth,$pictureHeight);
00351             $sprframe->Flip(); 
00352         }
00353         
00354         $agentName = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(1));
00355         
00356         $agentBlock = new COBAgentBlock($agentName,'');
00357         $agentBlock->AddQuantityAvailable($quantityAvailable);
00358         $agentBlock->AddExpiryDate($expiryDate);
00359         if($sprframe != null) {
00360           $agentBlock->AddThumbnail($sprframe);
00361         }
00362         foreach($objectScripts as $objectScript) {
00363             $agentBlock->AddEventScript($objectScript);
00364         }
00365         $agentBlock->AddInstallScript(implode("\n*c2ephp Install script seperator\n",$installScripts));
00366         return $agentBlock;
00367     }
00369 }
